sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_TPP_TRADE_TASK.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into TPP_TRADE_T_PAY_TASK (ID, REQ_ID, PAY_SYS_NO, BIZ_SYS_ACCOUNT_NO, ZENGDAI_ACCOUNT_NO, BIZ_SYS_NO, PAYER_ACCOUNT_NO, PAYER_ACCOUNT_NAME, RECEIVER_NAME, RECEIVER_BANK_CARD_NO, RECEIVER_BANK_CARD_TYPE, RECEIVER_ID_TYPE, RECEIVER_ID, RECEIVER_BANK_CODE, RECEIVER_SUB_BANK_CODE, CURRENCY, AMOUNT, FEE, BIZ_REMARK, BIZ_FLOW, PRIORITY, STATUS, REMARK, CREATER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SEND_THREAD_NAME, IS_SEPARATE, SEPARATE_COUNT, SPARE1, SPARE2, SEND_NUM, RECEIVER_ACCOUNT_NO, BIZ_TYPE, IS_NEED_PUSH, TRADE_STATUS, TRADE_RESULT_INFO, TRADE_SUCCESS_AMOUNT, INFO_CATEGORY_CODE) values (#id#, #reqId#, #paySysNo#, #bizSysAccountNo#, #zengdaiAccountNo#, #bizSysNo#, #payerAccountNo#, #payerAccountName#, #receiverName#, #receiverBankCardNo#, #receiverBankCardType#, #receiverIdType#, #receiverId#, #receiverBankCode#, #receiverSubBankCode#, #currency#, #amount#, #fee#, #bizRemark#, #bizFlow#, #priority#, #status#, #remark#, #creater#, #createTime#, #updateTime#, #sendThreadName#, #isSeparate#, #separateCount#, #spare1#, #spare2#, #sendNum#, #receiverAccountNo#, #bizType#, #isNeedPush#, #tradeStatus#, #tradeResultInfo#, #tradeSuccessAmount#, #infoCategoryCode#)

insert into TPP_TRADE_T_PAY_TASK (ID, REQ_ID, PAY_SYS_NO, BIZ_SYS_ACCOUNT_NO, ZENGDAI_ACCOUNT_NO, BIZ_SYS_NO, PAYER_ACCOUNT_NO, PAYER_ACCOUNT_NAME, RECEIVER_NAME, RECEIVER_BANK_CARD_NO, RECEIVER_BANK_CARD_TYPE, RECEIVER_ID_TYPE, RECEIVER_ID, RECEIVER_BANK_CODE, RECEIVER_SUB_BANK_CODE, CURRENCY, AMOUNT, FEE, BIZ_REMARK, BIZ_FLOW, PRIORITY, STATUS, REMARK, CREATER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SEND_THREAD_NAME, IS_SEPARATE, SEPARATE_COUNT, SPARE1, SPARE2, RECEIVER_ACCOUNT_NO, BIZ_TYPE, IS_NEED_PUSH, TRADE_STATUS, TRADE_RESULT_INFO, TRADE_SUCCESS_AMOUNT, INFO_CATEGORY_CODE) values (SEQ_TPP_TRADE_TASK.NEXTVAL, #reqId#, #paySysNo#, #bizSysAccountNo#, #zengdaiAccountNo#, #bizSysNo#, #payerAccountNo#, #payerAccountName#, #receiverName#, #receiverBankCardNo#, #receiverBankCardType#, #receiverIdType#, #receiverId#, #receiverBankCode#, #receiverSubBankCode#, #currency#, #amount#, #fee#, #bizRemark#, #bizFlow#, #priority#, #status#, #remark#, #creater#, #createTime#, #updateTime#, #sendThreadName#, #isSeparate#, #separateCount#, #spare1#, #spare2#, #receiverAccountNo#, #bizType#, #isNeedPush#, #tradeStatus#, #tradeResultInfo#, #tradeSuccessAmount#, #infoCategoryCode#)

update TPP_TRADE_T_PAY_TASK set UPDATE_TIME = sysdate
STATUS=#status#
IS_SEPARATE=#isSeparate#
SEPARATE_COUNT=#separateCount#
SEND_THREAD_NAME=#sendThreadName#
SEND_NUM=SEND_NUM+1
IS_NEED_PUSH=#isNeedPush#
where ID=#id#
sqlMap.select: select * from TPP_TRADE_T_PAY_TASK t where t.BIZ_FLOW=#bizFlow# and t.BIZ_SYS_NO=#bizSysNo#
select * from TPP_TRADE_T_PAY_TASK t where t.ID=#id# and rownum <= 1
select * from TPP_TRADE_T_PAY_TASK_HIS t where t.ID=#id# and rownum <= 1
